trigger: To determine whether the DNA binding proteins were related to NFkappaB and <extra_id_0> NFAT <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , dot blots using a SRC96D SNS minifold I dot blotter ( Schleicher & Schull , Dassel , Germany ) were performed with the following positive controls and antibodies ( all from Santa Cruz Biotechnology , Heidelberg , Germany ) : positive controls ( 10 ng / dot ) : NFkappaB <extra_id_0> p52 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 80 kD ) sc-4095WB , <extra_id_0> c-Rel <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 61 kD ) sc-4030WB ; Jurkat nuclear extract , PMA - stimulated ; primary antibodies ( 1 mug / dot ) : anti-NFkappaB <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( NLS ) sc-114 , anti-NFkappaB <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( A ) sc-109 , anti-NFkappaB <extra_id_0> p52 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 447 ) sc-848 , a rabbit polyclonal IgG1 antiserum , anti - <extra_id_0> c-rel <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( N466 ) sc-272 , anti - <extra_id_0> NFATc2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( M-20 ) sc-1151 , anti - <extra_id_0> NFATc1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( K-18 ) sc-1149 , two goat polyclonal IgG1 antisera ; secondary antibodies ( 0.8 mug / dot ) : goat anti-rabbit IgG AP-conjugate sc-2007 , and donkey anti-goat IgG AP-conjugate sc-2022 .
The nuclear proteins were blotted onto a nitrocellulose membrane ( Bio-Rad ) .

After blocking with PBS / 3 % BSA ( Fluka , Deisenhofen , Germany ) , the blot was incubated overnight with the primary antibodies diluted 1 : 2000 in PBS / 1 % BSA , washed again and incubated with the alkaline phosphatase-conjugated secondary antibody ( 1 : 500 in PBS / 1 % BSA ) .
The blot was developed using the Vectastain ( R ) staining kit ( Vector Laboratories Inc . Burlingame , CA , USA ) .
